page.topic: Open an .a5w page, static HTML page, URL, or PDF document, in a pop-up window or a DIV
page.description: Open a document (including .a5w pages, static .html pages, any other web page, e.g. www.google.com, or PDF document) in a modal, or modeless pop-up window, or in a DIV on the page.

section.description: Used with the Grid and UX component
